weekly picks (May 2 week 2023)

Posted on May 8, 2023 in 2023may,  Daily t.me,  adsabs,  g scholar

A WordCloud of 2023 May 2nd week collection

  1. s41586-023-06162-w Absence of near-ambient superconductivity in LuH2±xNy (HHWen, Nature)

  2. 2305.06751 Ab initio study of the structural, vibrational and optical properties of potential parent structures of nitrogen-doped lutetium hydride (LuH2, arXiv.org)

  3. 2305.06694 Carrier-Density Control of the Quantum-Confined 1$T$-TiSe$_2$ Charge-Density-Wave (TiSe2, arXiv.org)

  4. 2305.06596 Engineering of anomalous Josephson effect in coherently coupled Josephson junctions (arXiv.org)

  5. 2305.06949 Twisted bilayer graphene at charge neutrality: competing orders of SU(4) Dirac fermions (arXiv.org)

  6. 2305.06496 Topological Nernst and topological thermal Hall effect in rare-earth kagome ScMn$_6$Sn$_6$ (kagome, arXiv.org)

  7. 2305.06399 Quantization of the higher Berry curvature and the higher Thouless pump (arXiv.org)

  8. 2305.07007 Spectral properties, topological patches, and effective phase diagrams of finite disordered Majorana nanowires (arXiv.org)

  9. 2305.06837 Density of states, transport, and topology in disordered Majorana nanowires (arXiv.org)

  10. PhysRevLett.130.198401 Wrinkling Instability in Unsupported Epithelial Sheets (Wrinkling, PRL)

  11. s71 Proof That a Complex Quantum Network Is Truly Quantum (Physics)

  12. PhysRevB.107.174409 Current-induced dynamics of isolated antiferromagnetic antiskyrmion and antiskyrmionium (PRB)

  13. s41586-023-05885-0 Loophole-free Bell inequality violation with superconducting circuits (Nature)

  14. d41586-023-01488-x Superconducting qubits cover new distances (Nature)

  15. s41586-023-05883-2 Partitioning of diluted anyons reveals their braiding statistics (HSSim, Nature)

  16. s41586-023-05879-y Tunable electron-flexural phonon interaction in graphene heterostructures (Nature)

  17. 2305.06103 Pressure-induced color change arising from transformation between intra- and inter-band transitions in LuH${2\pm x}$N${y}$ (HHWen LuH2, arXiv.org)

  18. 2305.05683 Nagaoka ferromagnetism in doped Hubbard models in optical lattices (arXiv.org)

  19. 2305.06248 Eigenmodes of magnetic skyrmion lattices (skyrmion, arXiv.org)

  20. 2305.06241 Dynamical bulk boundary correspondence and dynamical quantum phase transitions in higher order topological insulators (arXiv.org)

  21. 2305.06020 Giant spin Nernst effect in a two-dimensional antiferromagnet due to magnetoelastic coupling-induced gaps and interband transitions between magnon-like bands (arXiv.org)

  22. 2305.06011 Correlations of spin splitting and orbital fluctuations due to 1/f charge noise in the Si/SiGe Quantum Dot (arXiv.org)

  23. 2305.05830 Inverse orbital Hall effect and orbitronic terahertz emission observed in the materials with weak spin-orbit coupling (arXiv.org)

  24. 2305.05906 Realization of all-band-flat photonic lattices (arXiv.org)

  25. adfm.202301817 d0 Magnetic Skyrmions in Two-Dimensional Lattice (d0 skyrmion, Advanced Functional Materials)

  26. 79 It’s Time to Take Quantum Biology Research Seriously (Physics)

  27. 2305.05498 Anomalous suppression of photo-induced in-gap weight in the optical conductivity of a two-leg Hubbard ladder (Yunoki, arXiv)

  28. 2305.05497 Magnon dispersion in ferromagnetic SrRuO$_3$ (SRO, arXiv)

  29. 2305.05254 Axial and polar magnetism in hexagonal YMnO3 (YMO, arXiv)

  30. 2305.05178 Origin of the exotic electronic states in antiferromagnetic NdSb (arXiv)

  31. 2305.05615 A discrete formulation of the Kane-Mele $\mathbb{Z}_2$ invariant (Shiozaki, arXiv)

  32. 2305.05582 Thermoelectric phenomena in an antiferromagnetic helix: Role of electric field (arXiv)

  33. 2305.05273 Microscopic Theory of Nonlinear Hall Effect Induced by Electric Field and Temperature Gradient (arXiv)

  34. 2305.04945 Non-Abelian hyperbolic band theory from supercells (Bzdusek, arXiv)

  35. PhysRevX.13.021021 Quantum Simulations of Interacting Systems with Broken Time-Reversal Symmetry (PRX)

  36. PhysRevLett.130.196001 Stabilizing Fluctuating Spin-Triplet Superconductivity in Graphene via Induced Spin-Orbit Coupling (PRL)

  37. PhysRevLett.130.198301 Long-Range Order and Directional Defect Propagation in the Nonreciprocal $\mathit{XY}$ Model with Vision Cone Interactions (PRL)

  38. 2305.04262 Magnetic field-induced weak-to-strong-link crossover in patterned superconducting films (arXiv.org)

  39. 2305.03856 Andreev reflection at altermagnet/superconductor interface (altermagnet, arXiv.org)

  40. 2305.04830 Thermal Hall effects in quantum magnets (GChen, arXiv.org)

  41. 2305.04280 Effect of random antiferromagnetic exchange on the spin waves in a three-dimensional Heisenberg ferromagnet (arXiv.org)

  42. 2305.03800 Incommensurability enabled quasi-fractal order in 1D narrow-band moir\‘e systems (arXiv.org)

  43. 2305.04888 Phase diagram of the $\nu = 2$ quantum Hall state in bilayer graphene (arXiv.org)

  44. 2305.04385 Lectures on spintronics and magnonincs (arXiv.org)

  45. PhysRevLett.130.193001 Quantum Criticality of Liquid-Gas Transition in a Binary Bose Mixture (PRL)

  46. acd327 In-plane spin excitation of skyrmion bags (Chinese Physics B)

  47. 74 Quantum Fluids of Light Come into Sharper View (Physics)

  48. 2305.03705 K. Alex Muller: Science between ferroelectricity and superconductivity (arXiv)

  49. 2305.03528 Ultrafast all-optical manipulation of the charge-density-wave in VTe$_{2}$ (arXiv)

  50. 2305.03400 Chiral excitations and the intermediate-field spin-liquid regime in the Kitaev magnet $\alpha$-RuCl$_3$ (arXiv)

  51. 2305.03673 Magnetism in the two-dimensional dipolar XY model (arXiv)

  52. 2305.03588 X-ray Magnetic Circular Dichroism in Altermagnetic $\alpha$-MnTe (arXiv)
